name: Makis Adventure (itch)
description:
This game is in a very early developement state. You can download the first gameplay demo. The main focus are the controls, so please leve a feedback (in the comments under the game, or with the feedback button in the main menu)

!!!There is no controller support for the UI yet. The ingame controls are controller supported (tested with xBox Controller) but the UI has to be controlled with the mouse.!!!

Story:

You take the role of Maki, a shark demon, who wakes up in an old and dark prison.  Face 6 dungeons and defeat mighty opponents. Explore the world and make friends with friendly creatures, who will help you on your adventure. At the end of your adventure you have to face a powerful Boss creature, to regain the throne of demons.


Characters:

Maki:
Maki is the main character of the game. He is a shark demon and has the ability to swim and walk, so theres nothing that can stop him. He is a small demon in the big dark world.

Shop Owner:
He is a very mysterious creature. You can find his shops all over the world. You can buy everything from him. He has great connections and can order everything you need. He is not allowed to help other demons, therfore he decided to hide his shops. Can you find him?



Prison Guard:
He is the first boss enemy. People still dont know if he is a goat or a Raven. His power is huge and you have to be aware of his strong attacks.


Darko:
He is the first NPC you will meet. He is also another demon who was hold in the prison. He has some pretty cool abilities, that will help you.



and many other characters to meet....
